unnormalised: This shift is vital for companies operating across diverse markets in India. Effective forecasting ensures that the right products, from Maruti Suzuki cars to sarees woven in Kanchipuram, are available at the right time and place, reducing warehouse space needs – perhaps saving Rs. 50,000 per month for a 1000 sq ft facility. Improved accuracy leads to better customer satisfaction and a more resilient supply chain, benefiting everyone from Mumbai wholesalers to local kirana stores in small towns.
